greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: T(n, k) = (m*n)!/(k!*(n-k)!)^m with m = 3; triangle read by rows, 0 <= k <= n.
link: G. C. Greubel, Rows n=0..100 of triangle, flattened
program: trianglerows(n) = for(x=0, n-1, for(y=0, x, print1(t(x, y), ", ")); print(""))
/* Print initial 6 rows of triangle as follows: */
(MAGMA) [[(Factorial(3*n)/(Factorial(n))^3)*Binomial(n, k)^3: k in [0..n]]: n in [0..15]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Oct 27 2018
xref: Cf. A007318 (Pascal, m=1), A069466 (m=2), this sequence (m=3).
results.author: _Peter Luschny_, Oct 21 2018
